Articles.Content:
Would you advise any good mod through which I could shed light on its base on the moon.

Sorry but I can not speak English well so I use Google translator.

If you have the paid version, you can use 2 mods from the plugin-powered subforum:


  • [li]The Bigtrak mod[/li]
    [li]something with \'floodlights\' in the thread title[/li]

;D

This mod is what you are looking for.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10128.0

You also need this mod to make it work.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=8431.0

novapunch remix - it\'s one of the most used mods, adds EVERYTHING (new more realistic engines, fuel tanks, bigger more realistic decouplers and adapters, fairings to cover your ship on ascent)

kosmos - I personally like this one I get to build Soviet space race-era space stations with working solar panels and such

fixed camera\'s - this is a must even you just have the stock game, watch your craft take off through the views of various cameras that you pin to the exterior of your ship
Knowing even a good mod through which I could build a month sneak.
